adrFormatAddress: 250 W 94th St Suite 2H, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: We are extremely thankful for Go Mayever as they planned a beautiful and extraordinary trip for us to Israel this past March! We began planning 6 months in advance and they truly wanted to get to know our family and our interests, travel preferences, etc, all while being completely transparent with their prices and fees. Not only were the two weeks the perfect mix of physical activity, history, culinary experiences, music workshops, and real life living in Israel, the entire trip felt  tailored specifically to fit our families with authentic and unique excursions. We were in great hands from beginning to end and everyone at Go Mayever made the planning and traveling completely stress free - they were really there for us every step of the way. I am already looking forward to working with them to plan our next adventure ! Grateful for Go Mayever !

originalText.text:
Mayever was amazing to work with. They have a fabulous team based in Israel and the US. They are expert travel providers. Our guide, Beni, was very knowledgeable, entertaining and flexible to the needs of the group. They were a pleasure.
Highly recommend!

text.text:
Mayever was amazing to work with. They have a fabulous team based in Israel and the US. They are expert travel providers. Our guide, Beni, was very knowledgeable, entertaining and flexible to the needs of the group. They were a pleasure.
Highly recommend!

originalText.text: There’s a lot on the Mayever website that seems very pie in the sky- content written for promotional purposes. After going on a tour with Mayever, I now know it is all true. In fact, I could have written it all myself, because that is what  I experienced with my family. I just completed a tour with family and friends. We were 12 people in all, ranging in age from 12-65, with varying levels of observance and experience in Israel.  For some it was our first time in Israel and others had extensive experience that dates back to 1966 for one of us. We also had someone with special needs on the trip. Everyone’s needs were met. We actually did have the perfect tour guide for our group and we all learned and saw and experienced new things. It actually was an experience and not just a tour. That was possible because the team at Mayever communicated so well and listened to us all along.

originalText.text: Beni and the Mayever team is amazing! They think of everything and help you experience Israel in all its complicated beauty. Thank you for an incredible experience!

text.text: Beni and the Mayever team is amazing! They think of everything and help you experience Israel in all its complicated beauty. Thank you for an incredible experience!

originalText.text:
Mayever planned and executed the most incredible and seamless Israel family trip for us in June of 2023.  We travelled the entire country for two weeks with the most informative, enthusiastic, exciting and flexible tour guide who paid attention to everything down to the smallest detail. Mayever's guides explained the complicated history of Israel in bite sized understandable pieces. We learned so much and had an exciting adventure every day which we loved as an active family constantly on the go!
Stacey Stanton
